fields.Word: Word should be lower, like WORD to word
fields.WordType: Type should be v, n, adj, adv
fields.Suggest: Suggest should be like 80% characters of word are hide, suggest to s___g__

Basic.legacyInstruction: "suggest": hide 80% of characters like s____g__. "Front" and "Back" content MUST be in the TARGET LANGUAGE specified by the user. Do not mix languages.
